name: Avoider (itch) (Nancy Dor)
description:
Game Made for a university Game Jam
Avoid the Ghosts! 

Avoider is a mini Game, that I hope to develop further as a game where every mini Game inside is a round where you need to Avoid something, like walls of a maze, Roads or barriers. 
It is inspired by Games I played during my childhood. 

it has Very easy levels for now, which is suitable for younger people, and for someone who plays games more often I recommend the Hard or difficult levels, Try beating your own high-score by lasting longer.

Good Luck!
